column1: Anyama is a city in south-eastern Ivory Coast. It is a suburb of Abidjan and is one of four sub-prefectures of Abidjan Autonomous District. Anyama is also a commune. The city is about 20 kilometres north of Abidjan.
Villages in the sub-prefecture include Akoupé-Zeudji
Anyama is represented in football by Rio Sport d'Anyama.
